title: California suspends Cruise’s autonomous driverless vehicle permits
description: The California Department of Motor Vehicles suspended Cruise’s autonomous vehicle deployment and driverless testing permits, effective immediately.

title: Police love Google’s surveillance data. Here’s how to protect yourself.
description: Novel ways of using Google’s search and location data are helping police. But privacy advocates say it’s violating Americans’ constitutional rights.

title: 41 states sue Meta, claiming Instagram, Facebook are addictive, harm kids
description: Dozens of states are accusing Facebook and Instagram parent Meta of designing addictive features that harm kids.

title: Violent videos and ‘brutal voyeurism’ are redefining modern war
description: From Russian soldiers shot down on camera to Hamas fighters slain as they tried to escape the Israeli navy, the scenes now shared across the internet are far more violent and graphic than in previous conflicts.
